title: AIKA
description:
Property Description

AIKA WITH HOT TUB & PETFRIENDLY




Do you want to take a break from everyday life for a few days? The AIKA (means ‘time’ in Finnish) is the perfect place to take some time for yourself. Imagine that the clock has stopped ticking and take advantage of this experience to find yourself alone, as a couple, with your friends or your family, in an intimate and unique setting.




The AIKA is a 4-person cabin (additional charges will apply for 2 people and more, per night). Perched at an altitude of 535 meters, it has everything to seduce you and allow you to spend a comforting moment, far from the hustle and bustle. All you have to do is relax and soak up on good vibrations surrounded by nature.




This unique place offers a wide range of activities, including mountain biking, hiking, cross-country skiing, fat-biking and snowshoeing with direct access to the trails (mandatory pass of the Sentiers du Moulin).




(CITQ #311053) Exp. 2025-10-18




For each reservation, a tree will be planted to repopulate the beautiful forests of Canada and around the world.




                                                                   AMENITIES




INSIDE :




Capacity of 4 guests (for more than 2, additional fees will apply per night, per additional guest) Bedroom with 2 queen size beds on the first floor and blackout curtains and televisions Office space on the first floor Sofa-bed on the ground floor Bathroom with shower Fully equipped kitchen Electric oven / microwave Induction cooktop Toaster Keurig Coffee Maker (10 included pods) & French Press Style Coffee Maker (coffee not included) Dining table (4 people) Dishwasher Fridge and freezer 2 in 1 washer and dryer Underfloor heating and air conditioning Wood stove Drinking water Condiments and oil; salt & pepper WIFI Shampoo, conditioner, soap Beddings and towels First aid kit Smoke and carbon monoxide detector, extinguisher




OUTSIDE :




Hot tube Free parking Firepit Table and chairs (4 people) BBQ Partly covered terrace Bike storage space (under the patio) Patio heater Generator PLEASE NOTE - Accessible via a forest road (gravel) - Winter tires and all-wheel drive are mandatory to access the cabin from November 1st to April 30th, otherwise shuttle service is available ($) - Animals are accepted ($ extra fee) - Access from the cabin: snowmobile, mountain bike, fatbike, walking or snowshoeing trails (mandatory FCMQ or Sentiers du Moulin pass) - Complementary services: Prepared meals - Massage therapy - Yoga/hypnosis - Robe rental - Shuttle service - Community charging stations: Download Foresta, the ultimate app to recharge your batteries, and find The Basecamp, which is one of our community charging stations located at the entrance of the mountain. - Please bring warm clothing for your mountain stay - Service fees and taxes apply per stay - The cabin is not suitable for people with reduced mobility and young children - Strict cancellation policies. Stay dates non-exchangeable, stay is non-refundable - Petfriendly (an additional fee per pet will be charged

title: YAK
description:
Property Description

YAK WITH THERMAL BASIN & PETFRIENDLY Welcome to Yak, an oasis of elegance in the heart of Montagne Maelström, at an altitude of 530 meters, where style meets comfort. The Yak is perfect for family getaways or gatherings with friends. With 2 carefully furnished closed bedrooms (one with a queen bed and the other with a double bed) and a sofa bed, 4 to 6 people can come together while enjoying privacy. At Yak, you won’t miss waking up every morning to a breathtaking spectacle. The large windows offer a panoramic view of the forest and surrounding mountains, creating an unforgettable backdrop for your stay. In terms of comfort, everything is there! Air conditioning for hot summer days, heated floors, and a gas fireplace to keep you warm during cold winter days. If you enjoy lively meals around a large table, Yak’s dining area comfortably seats 6 people. Enjoy convivial meals and memorable evenings. To prepare your meals, you’ll find all the amenities of your kitchen at Yak: an 11-cubic-foot refrigerator, microwave/convection oven, gas stove, and dishwasher. What will make your stay truly memorable is the outdoor thermal pool with a unique glass window that allows you to contemplate the mountains, even underwater. Experience Yak and be forever amazed and captivated, to the point of exclaiming: oh my Yak! This unique place also offers nature lovers the opportunity to engage in a multitude of activities, including mountain biking, hiking, cross-country skiing, fat biking, and snowshoeing with direct access to the trails named La Maléfique or La Vortex. You can access these trails directly from Yak (mandatory pass from Sentiers du Moulin). Connect with nature and experience luxury glamping in this rustic Mirador-type lodge that will charm and invigorate you. (CITQ #316847) Exp. 2025-12-07 For each reservation, a tree will be planted to repopulate the beautiful forests of Canada and around the world.

title: THE LAGÖM
description:
Property Description

THE LAGÖM" Becoming the symbol of the Maelström Mountain wasn’t in Lagöm’s plans. Yet, it happened. And it happened because it was designed with the intention of embodying both simplicity and boldness. Unintentionally, Lagöm paved the way for this trend so that today, the Maelström Mountain stands out with a unique and original offer of rental cabins. Perched between sky and earth, at 550 meters above sea level, The Lagöm stands like a beacon calling for balance. From the road, it seems to turn its back on us. But as soon as we climb the few steps leading to the terrace, we realize that it’s to better face one of the most spectacular views that Mother Nature has created. As we get lost in the raw beauty of the mountains and valleys stretching as far as the eye can see, worries evaporate to make way for a state of contemplation. Then we turn around, and finally, The Lagöm shows us its face. Tall and large windows give us a glimpse of a minimalist design bathed in natural light. Once inside, we feel that the space has been designed to nourish the soul and elevate the spirit. On the ground floor, lush plants adorn the space, while a strategically placed mirror in the kitchenette reflects the outdoor view, creating the illusion of a window. Upstairs, the view leaves us speechless, and the bed, as comfortable as a cloud, makes us want to lie down on our backs. The Lagöm’s little extras: • Its thermal tub that allows the body to bathe in well-being while the eyes bathe in the beauty of the scenery. • Its terrace at tree canopy level that gives the impression of being on top of the world. • Its energy certification: 100% operational on solar energy, The Lagöm is eco energy certified. • While staying at The Lagöm, make sure to do more than just appreciate the scenery. Dive into it by venturing onto the nearby trails. Whether you prefer leisurely strolls (such as hiking, snowshoeing, or cross-country skiing) or crave excitement (like mountain biking or fat biking), there’s an adventure waiting that perfectly suits your preferences and level of thrill. (CITQ # 298420) Exp. 2025-09-30 For each reservation, a tree will be planted to repopulate the beautiful forests of Canada and around the world. AMENITIES INSIDE : Capacity of 4 guests (for more than 2, additional fees will apply per night, per additional guest) 1 mezzanine room 1 king size bed + 1 sofa bed (double bed) Bathroom with shower Fully equiped kitchen Dining table (4 people when adding the extension) Small fridge Breville espresso machine (Please note - you must bring your coffee with a Breville 3 grind) Milk frother Air conditioning Gas stove Pulsed-air heating Solar curtains Portable bluetooth speaker Large bay window that offers panoramic views Gas fireplace WIFI Drinkable water Beddings and towels Shampoo, conditionner, soap OUTSIDE : Dramatic landscapes With Hot Tub Free parking Firepit BBQ (summer only) Lounger chairs (summer only) Patio Bike-in / Bike-out Bicycle rack Closed bicycle storage Bike washing station PLEASE NOTE - No television - No microwave - Complementary services: Prepared meals - Massage therapy - Yoga/hypnosis - Robe rental - Shuttle service - Community charging stations: Download Foresta, the ultimate app to recharge your batteries, and find The Basecamp, which is one of our community charging stations located at the entrance of the mountain. - Powered by solar energy - Unpaved access road (gravel) - Winter tires and all-wheel drive are mandatory to access the cabin from November 1st to April 30th, otherwise shuttle service is available ($) - Access from the cabin to snowmobile, mountain bike, fatbike, walking and snowshoe trails (mandatory pass required from FMCQ or Sentiers du Moulin) - The cabin is not suitable for people with reduced mobility and young children - Please bring warm clothes for your stay in the mountains - Service charges, tourist tax, GST and QST apply per stay - Strict cancellation policies. title: Boho Jungle Haven in Tulum
description:
Property Description

Escape to our chic jungle retreat! Surrounded by lush nature, it's a serene paradise. Adorned with handcrafted decor, the interior exudes understated elegance and boho charm. Relax in the tranquil jungle with a private plunge pool on the balcony (hot & cold water options). Enjoy convenience with 2 full bathrooms and a spacious double-height design. Remote workers have an ideal workspace with high-speed internet. Discover natural beauty and stylish comfort in this idyllic escape. The space This is a handpicked decorated loft in Tulum, surrounded by nature you may enjoy the 2fl distribution of the unit where you will get plenty of natural sunlight during the day. Guest access The Neighborhood is called Region 15, happens to be the newest area in Tulum being developed. La Veleta is a 5-min drive, city center 10-15min drive, beach 15-20min drive. To get around you could use taxis, but it may be more convenient to have your own transportation method (Car, scooter, or at least a bike). There is free parking both in the building and on the street 24hrs. Other things to note Tulum is one of the fastest growing cities in Mexico, as a result there may be occasional power outages all over the town, you’ll be surrounded mostly by jungle however you may see sites being developed. Natural area with no street illumination at night and unpaved roads there could be potholes during the rainy season. Tulum's Cellular network is not the best, make sure to plan ahead, as internet access could be limited to Wi-Fi networks.

title: Seaside 2BR Penthouse with Pool-C301
description:
Property Description

Welcome to Your Perfect Island Escape! 

 

Nestled in the serene Punta Cocos area, Yum Balam is located in the island’s most peaceful corner, offering you a tranquil retreat away from the bustle of the tourist crowds. 

 

Enjoy amazing ocean views and breathtaking sunsets from your private rooftop and access a nearly private, turquoise beach just steps away. 

 

Stay connected with ease, as we offer Starlink WiFi up to 50 megas, ensuring that you can enjoy smooth browsing and streaming during your stay. 




The space 




Charming 2 bedroom penthouse with private terrace, pool & ocean views. 

 

Perfect for families, couples, or friends, this stunning penthouse offers an unforgettable vacation experience where you can unwind and reconnect with nature. 

 

The master bedroom features a queen-size bed, while the second bedroom offers twin beds. For additional comfort, there's a sofa bed in the living room that accommodates one adult. Enjoy 2 full bathrooms, a smart TV in the living room, and a washer/dryer for added convenience. The fully equipped kitchen allows you to prepare your favorite meals, making it easy to relax and dine in. Both bedrooms and the living area are fitted with sheer and blackout blinds for your comfort. 

 

Designed for a tranquil retreat, this apartment offers the perfect atmosphere to soak in the serene sounds of nature and watch stunning sunsets. Step outside onto your private terrace and pool area, where you can truly unwind. 

 

We’re very close from a popular bioluminescence viewing spot—experience the magical phenomenon, especially during the new moon. 

 

Traveling with a larger group? Let us know, and we’ll share details on additional sister apartments in the same building! We can accommodate a group up to 30 people. 

 

*The building does not have an elevator; stairs must be used for access. 




Guest access 




Guests also have access to the shared common areas and the pool. 

 

Pool Hours: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM 

 

The private pool has no specific hours, but we kindly ask guests to be mindful of noise after 10:00 PM to ensure a peaceful environment for all. 




Other things to note 




*ABOUT HOLBOX: Holbox Island is a true rustic paradise, where nature remains the star. The island’s sandy streets and unspoiled beaches are carefully preserved to maintain their natural beauty. Unlike other destinations that clear sargassum or restrict beach access, Holbox embraces its wild side, offering open and public shores for all to enjoy. 

The island’s character shifts with the seasons. During the rainy season, puddles can form along the sandy roads, adding to its laid-back, rustic charm. 

Yum Balam’s secluded location away from the lively town center enhances its peaceful atmosphere, though it’s a good idea to plan your transportation in advance to fully enjoy the tranquility. 

 

*PET-FRIENDLY POLICY: We welcome your pets! Please follow these guidelines to ensure a great stay for everyone: 

- Clean up after your pet and dispose of waste properly. 

- Pets must not be left unattended in the unit or terrace. 

- Ensure pets do not disturb other guests. 

- Owners are responsible for any damages caused by their pets. 

- A pet fee is charged to cover the extra cleaning needed due to the beach environment. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation! 

 

*WELCOME AMENITIES: We provide essential welcome items such as toilet paper, shampoo, dish soap, and drinking water. Once these are used up, guests are kindly asked to restock them. 

 

*QUIET HOURS: To ensure a restful stay, we have quiet hours from 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM. We kindly ask all guests to respect this, as Yum Balam is designed to be a peaceful retreat. 

 

*CONCIERGE SERVICES: We’re here to help with all your needs, from arranging private airport transfers and pre-arranged grocery shopping to connecting you with tour operators, booking massages, and assisting with golf or bike rentals. 

 

*LONG-TERM RENTALS: Please note that electricity consumption is not included in long-term rentals (over 28 nights). 

 

*PEST CONTROL: While we fumigate monthly, please understand that, being surrounded by nature, mosquitoes, ants, and other insects are common. 

 

*POWER OUTAGES: Power outages can occasionally occur in Holbox, especially due to storms or issues with the local power company. 

 

*CASH RECOMMENDATIONS: We highly recommend traveling with cash, specially for taxis. 

 

*DRINKING WATER: We offer complimentary drinking water for your convenience. Should you need more, 20-liter bottles can be purchased for $100 MXN. 

 

*REVIEWS: We truly value your feedback—it helps us grow and ensures we’re delivering the best experience possible. If you encounter any concerns during your stay, please let us know so we can address them right away. Our goal is for you to have an amazing 5-star experience, and we want to make sure there are no surprises when it's time to share your review!

This stunning two-level apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort and tranquility, ideal for a calming stay.  On the ground floor, you'll find a well-equipped kitchen and dining area with a TV, seamlessly overlooking a private patio—perfect for enjoying meals and relaxing. For added convenience, there’s also a half bathroom. The first bedroom features an ensuite bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort.  Upstairs, you'll discover the second bedroom, complete with its own en-suite bathroom. Ascend one more level to the exclusive rooftop, where you can unwind in the plunge pool while taking in breathtaking views of the surrounding nature.  This apartment is thoughtfully designed to blend with its environment, featuring large glass windows that flood the space with natural light and offer views of the surrounding greenery. This creates a tranquil and sophisticated atmosphere, making it the perfect retreat for your Tulum getaway. Experience the unique charm of this serene escape! 

Guest access 

The entire apartment is exclusively yours for the duration of your stay and is designed for four people only. You’ll also enjoy your own completely private rooftop and plunge pool, offering a secluded escape. 

Other things to note 

 This is a 3-level apartament. The use of stairs is necessary.   We include welcome amenities: toiler paper, shampoo, dish soap, drinking water, etc. Once guests run out of these, they should restock their own.  Yes, we are pet friendly and we want you to have a great time with your furry love in Tulum. Nevertheless, we care a lot about maintaining our properties clean and in good conditions. If we find any damages in the furniture or excess dog hair we will have to charge an extra cleaning / professional furniture cleaning, or whatever is needed.   We do not include daily cleaning; however, in stays over 7 nights we do include courtesy cleanings depending on the length of stay.   If you need extra cleaning service we can of course provide them with an extra cost.   Our concierge team is always available to help you schedule private transportation from and to the airport, tours, massages, etc.   Long term rentals available, please reach out if you have any questions.   We do not include electricity consumption in stays over 20 nights.   We fumigate monthly but please understand we are located amongst nature so mosquitoes, ants and some other insects are common.   It´s important to mention that Tulum has power outages from time to time that may be affected by storms or the power company.   We provide some drinking water as a courtesy. In case you need more during your stay, we have 20 L water bottles for sale $100 mxn.  To get to Calma Tulum, you must take a short unpaved street.   Our reviews mean everything to us. Reviews can make or break our business. If you have any issues during your stay, please reach out so we can try and fix the problem and have no nasty surprises when it comes to review time. We want you to have a great 5 time!

title: Heated Pool-Spacious Home 7 Min to Beach, BBQ
description:
Property Description

Spacious 4-bedroom House is only 10 minutes away from the beach! After a dbeach, parks & attractions nearby, relax & entertain the kids in this family-friendly home. You will feel like you are in paradise with a place to unwind.  ✔ HEATED POOL ✔ Water Pool SLIDE ✔ Screened Patio, BBQ, and outdoor dining ✔ Trampoline ✔ Table Tennis and Air Hockey ✔ Smart TVs in each room ✔ Kids Entertainment: Play Set, Board games, Drawing Supplies, Table, Giant Jenga ✔ Sleep 16  

The space  

Our Mission is to provide the best Vacation Rental Home experience for all our guests no matter what brought you to the area. We are set up for families, friend groups, nurses, & business travelers. There is a little bit of everything in our home including a place to relax by the heated pool, splash on the water slide, jump on the trampoline, grill a fantastic meal for friends/family, enjoy a meal outside, or sip a cup of coffee on the private, screened in patio, unwind with a movie, sleep in & relax in our Luxury King & Queen beds, get a little work done, or have a home base for an extended period of time.  ★ 4 BEDROOMS ★ There are 4 bright bedrooms within the home filled with comfortable beds topped in hotel-quality linen along with wall-mounted Smart TVs and reading lamps giving everyone their own space to unwind. ✔ Master Bedroom: 1 King Bed, Crib ✔ 2nd Bedroom:: 2 Queen Beds, Pack-N-Play ✔ 3rd Bedroom: 1 Queen Bed ✔ 4th Bedroom: 2 Full Beds ✔ Living Room: 2 Sofa beds and Air Mattress Clean Sheets are provided for all beds with extra pillows and blankets.  ★ LIVING ROOM★ Stream all your favorites on the big-screen TV while you relax on the sofa loaded with soft cushions. Air mattress can be used to accommodate an additional two guests.  ✔ Air Hockey ✔ Highspeed WI-FI ✔ Smart TV ✔ Kids’ Playhouse, Board games, Drawing Table, Giant Jenga ✔ Space for additional guests  ★ KITCHEN & DINING ★ Prepare all your family favorites in the modern kitchen that comes fully equipped with everything you could need to cook. Brew up your coffee each morning at the Keurig coffee station then hydrate throughout the day with filtered water and ice from the handy fridge dispenser. Serve up your culinary creations at the dining table or open up the double glass doors and entertain outside in style with poolside alfresco dining.  ✔ Essential cookware & utensils ✔ Baking sheets ✔ Coffee machine and Kettle (some coffee and tea is provided) ✔ Cooking Oil & Spices: Sugar / Salt / Pepper ✔ 1 Paper Towel Roll to get you started, you must provide the rest for the duration of your stay. ✔ Spacious Dining Table ✔ Outdoor Dining and BBQ ✔ First Aid Kit ✔ Dishwasher, Dish Soap and 5 pods to start with ✔ 5 Trash Bags, you must provide the rest for the duration of your stay.  ★ 2 BATHROOMS ★ The 2 bathrooms come stocked with all the essential amenities and plenty of fluffy towels for your stay. ✔ Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Soap ✔ Hand Soap ✔ Hair Dryers ✔ Bath Towels (1 per guest), hand towels, and beach towels to all Guests upon Check-in. ✔ 4 Toilet Paper Rolls to get you started, you must provide the rest for the duration of your stay.  Guests also have access to the full laundry with a washer and dryer set so you can pack light and wash on the go. ✔ Iron ✔ Ironing Board ✔ Laundry Detergent ✔ Broom/Mop/ Dust Pan  ★ OUTDOOR ★ Step out into your own private outdoor oasis and dive into the refreshing pool surrounded by relaxing sun lounges and a fun trampoline for the kids. Fire up the BBQ grill on a sunny day and spend your afternoons soaking up the sun surrounded by friends at the outdoor table.  ✔ Resort Style Heated Pool (40$/night) ✔ Water Slide ✔ Inflatable Pool Toys ✔ Trampoline ✔ Sun Lounges with Beach Towels ✔ Screened Patio with Table Tennis and Dining Table ✔ Gas Grill - If the gas tank is empty you can exchange it at almost any gas station and we will refund you money!  

Guest access  

SWIMMING POOL Our pool is private and you get full access to it. We also offer the heated option for an additional fee. Regular pool water temperature is usually comfortable all year long, anyway if you prefer it warmer or traveling with kids, we recommend requesting it in advance.  During winter months it can take up to 48 hours to get to the desired temperature (82 Fahrenheit max). Please be advised that it might take longer if the air temperature is lower than 70. For last-minute bookings, it will be turned on as soon as possible.  We charge 40$/night for the whole stay to cover extra electricity expenses. We do not add it to the rental price, because not all people want to use it, and we are trying to keep our properties affordable for everyone.  EARLY CHECK-IN / LATE CHECK-OUT Check-in is after 4:00 pm and Check-out is 10:00 am. You will be provided with an access code that activates at your arrival. Early Check-In or Late Check-out are subject to availability and need to be requested in advance. We charge a flat fee of $40 per hour, if you need to get more than 2 hours, reach out for a custom quote.  Baggage drop-off is available by request and depends on availability.  Guests have private access to the entire home and outdoor areas as well as free Wi-Fi, free parking for 5 cars, complimentary coffee, and access to the full laundry and streaming apps on the Smart TVs.  Pool Service is scheduled weekly, usually on Thursdays. It might change due to weather conditions. Lawn Service is done every 2 weeks. Please let us know if you need specific dates when services will be done during your stay.  

Other things to note  

We are located in a residential neighborhood. Please be mindful of our neighbors and city laws all the time. Read the rules carefully to prevent any issues during your stay.  ★LOUD NOISES ARE PROHIBITED★ Any sound that crosses a property line at an unreasonable loud volume is unlawful within the city and may be subject to a fine of up to $1000. Per occurrence, as per the city noise ordinance of the Oakland Park Code of Ordinance. QUITE HOURS: 9:00PM - 9:00AM - this means that during this time NO MUSIC is to be played in the backyard or pool area, and, NO NOISE - anyone outside must keep all conversations to a cell phone level to ensure we don’t disturb our neighbors who have work and kids that go to school.  ★ NO PARTIES/EVENTS ★ We kindly ask you to treat our home as your own to preserve its pristine condition for future guests and your return visits. House is only for you and amount of people mentioned in the reservation. All unauthorized visitors will be considered as house rules violations. Guests agree to keep premises in good condition and be financially responsible for any items missing or broken.\  ★ NO STREET/GRASS PARKING - 5 CARS ONLY★ NO STREET OR GRASS parking, it is strictly prohibited. Our vacation rental has a license for only 5 cars being parked at the property parking lot. Parking on the street, on grass, behind bushes, or by neighbors' houses is illegal and will result in a violation of city law. All vehicles associated with the Vacation Rental must be parked within a driveway in compliance with the Code of Ordinances of the City of Oakland Park.  ★ NO SMOKING ★ Please refrain from smoking (anything) inside the home! Any smoking evidence will result in a fee for Odor Removal, Duct Cleaning, and furniture cleaning. You will be required to pay an additional odor removal fee of $750. SMOKING MARIJUANA (inside, outside, in the front yard, in the backyard, on our parking lot - anywhere on the property) IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED. If our neighbors or personnel report the smell of weed, we will be required to call authorities, since it is illegal in Florida and prohibited at our vacation rental.  ★ NO DRUGS or WEAPONS ★ Our community has zero tolerance towards DRUGS or WEAPONS, and it will be reported to the City Police immediately.  ★ PET-FRIENDLY HOME ★ Bring your furry friends along for an exciting vacation. They’ll get to enjoy and run around the spacious backyard while you relax by the pool. Please note that we charge a FEE 100$ per pet. Please clean after your pets if needed.  SECURITY AND SAFETY  We are doing our best to keep the community and our guests safe. It does not record audio or video.  By booking this home, you are agreeing to these house rules and agree to hold yourself liable for any personal injuries that may occur during your stay on the property. With games, fun activities, and a dedicated work area, this property is an ideal destination for families, friends, and remote workers looking to balance relaxation and productivity. Escape the winter blues and bask in the warm Fort Lauderdale sunshine at Villa Rio.

 If your dream is to live long enough to time travel, your dream has now come true! You can now travel back in time at micro-chalet Le Pic. A unique concept on 5 levels that can accommodate 6 people (2 people and more / additional charges will apply per night $). At each level, an era: Retro kitchen from the 1960s with a breathtaking panorama, lounge bar from the 1960s, 1970s dormitory with a catamaran net, 1980s bathroom and master bedroom offering a breathtaking view of the surrounding mountains. Around the micro-chalet, you can enjoy a multitude of outdoor activities thanks to the hiking and mountain biking trails that start directly from the micro-chalet, allowing you to explore the surrounding mountains and valleys. In winter, you can practice snowshoeing and fatbiking. In the evening, after a busy day, you can relax on the terrace and listen to the calm of the mountain. The Pic is the ideal place for nature lovers and people looking for tranquility in an enchanting setting in the mountains.

description:
Property Description

SOUS-BOIS WITH HOT TUB & PETFRIENDLY Do you know many places where pleasure and relaxation come together? Le Sous-Bois cabin can proudly claim to be one of those places. As soon as you cross the threshold, you are engulfed in well-being. The white paneling of the walls invites us to inhale and exhale deeply to release tension and leave it where it belongs: outside the four walls of this haven of peace. Then, our gaze is drawn to the top of the stairs, where a living space flooded with light awaits, thanks to the three almost entirely glazed facades. Upon ascending the stairs, we realize that all elements of the decor are coordinated. The large caramel leather sectional harmonizes with the stools at the island, where 6 people can comfortably sit, and the wood veneer of the kitchen cabinets. • We love the retro microwave and toaster that add a stylish and nostalgic touch to the overall decor. • We “kif” (as the French say) the projector that unfolds in front of the large window wall, allowing for movie nights with nature as the backdrop. • Above all, we adore the hot tub on the ground floor terrace, which, thanks to the surrounding trees, allows for relaxation in complete privacy. Mountain bike or fat bike enthusiasts particularly appreciate the secure bike storage and convenient access to several nearby trails. Not to mention the outdoor fireplace area and the indoor gas fireplace that are conducive to creating festive or cozy moments. At le Sous-Bois cabin, there’s everything to be happy about. Book your moment of happiness now. For every reservation made, a tree will be planted to repopulate the beautiful forests of Canada and beyond. description:
Property Description

Samiik is a brand new condo located in the jungle near la Veleta neighborhood, surrounded by nature this place will be great for romantic getaways or to simple enjoy some quiet time with yourself. The Studio is at the top of the building (2nd floor) which offers a great view to the trees top. Enjoy the Mayan jungle of Tulum while practicing yoga at the deck. The space This is a handpicked decorated loft in Tulum, surrundend by nature you may enjoy the 2fl distribution of the unit where you will get plenty of natural sun ligth during the day. Guest access The Neighbourhood is called Region 15, happens to be the newest area in Tulum being developed. La Veleta is a 5min drive, city centre 10-15min drive, beach 15-20min drive. To get around you use taxis but it may be more convenient to have your own transportation method (Car,scooter,bike). There is free parking both in the building and on the street 24hrs. Other things to note Tulum is one of the fastest growing cities in Mexico, as a result there may be occasional power outages all over the town, you’ll be surrounded mostly by jungle however you may see sites being developed. Natural area with no street illumination at night and unpaved roads there could be potholes during the rainy season. Tulum's Cellular network is not the best, make sure to plan ahead, as internet access could be limited to Wi-Fi networks.

title: Oceanview Penthouse with Rooftop
description:
Property Description

Welcome to Your Perfect Island Escape!  Nestled in the serene Punta Cocos area, Yum Balam is located in the island’s most peaceful corner, offering you a tranquil retreat away from the bustle of the tourist crowds.  Enjoy amazing ocean views and breathtaking sunsets from your private rooftop and access a nearly private, turquoise beach just steps away.  Stay connected with ease, as we offer Starlink WiFi up to 50 megas, ensuring that you can enjoy smooth browsing and streaming during your stay. 

The space 

Charming 2-Bedroom Penthouse with Private Terrace & Pool.  Perfect for families, couples, or friends seeking a peaceful getaway, this beautiful penthouse offers the ideal blend of comfort and nature. Enjoy stunning views, a private terrace, and your own plunge pool for ultimate relaxation.  The master bedroom features a queen-size bed, while the second bedroom offers twin-size beds. The living room has a comfortable sofa bed. Two full bathrooms, smart TVs in each bedroom and the living room, and a washer/dryer in the apartment for your convenience. The fully equipped kitchen lets you enjoy home-cooked meals during your stay. Sheer and blackout blinds in both bedrooms and the living room ensure restful sleep.  This penthouse is perfect for guests looking to unwind and connect with nature. Relax with the sounds of birds, take in the scenic views, and immerse yourself in the tranquility of this serene retreat.  We’re just a short walk from the best spot to experience the magical bioluminescence phenomenon. You can also catch the stunning display right from the beach in front of the property, particularly during the new moon.  Traveling with a larger group? Let us know, and we’ll share details on additional sister apartments in the same building! We can accommodate a group up to 30 people.  *The building does not have an elevator; stairs must be used for access. 

Guest access 

Guests also have access to the shared common areas and the pool.  Pool Hours: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM  The private pool has no specific hours, but we kindly ask guests to be mindful of noise after 10:00 PM to ensure a peaceful environment for all. 

Other things to note 

Microwave is currently out of service  ABOUT HOLBOX: Holbox Island is a true rustic paradise, where nature remains the star. The island’s sandy streets and unspoiled beaches are carefully preserved to maintain their natural beauty. Unlike other destinations that clear sargassum or restrict beach access, Holbox embraces its wild side, offering open and public shores for all to enjoy. The island’s character shifts with the seasons. title: Charming 2BR Apt - A201
description:
Property Description

Welcome to Your Perfect Island Escape! 

Nestled in the serene Punta Cocos area, Yum Balam is located in the island’s most peaceful corner, offering you a tranquil retreat away from the bustle of the tourist crowds. 

Enjoy breathtaking sunsets from your balcony and access a nearly private, turquoise beach just steps away. 

Stay connected with ease, as we offer Starlink WiFi up to 50 megas, ensuring that you can enjoy smooth browsing and streaming during your stay. 

The space 

Perfect for families, couples, or friends, this beautiful apartment offers a peaceful retreat surrounded by nature. The master bedroom features a king-size bed, while the second bedroom has a queen-size bed. A queen-size sofa bed is also available in the living room. Enjoy 2 full bathrooms, a smart TV in the living room, and in-unit washer and dryer. The fully equipped kitchen is ideal for preparing your meals, whether you’re staying in to relax or cooking up a feast. Both bedrooms and the living room have sheer and blackout blinds for your comfort. 

This apartment is a haven for nature lovers, with the soothing sounds of birds and stunning sunsets setting the perfect ambiance for relaxation. Just meters away from the island's main spot to view the magical bioluminescence phenomenon at night, you can even enjoy it right from the beach in front, especially during the new moon. 

Traveling with a larger group? Let us know, and we’ll share details on additional sister apartments in the same building! We can accommodate a group up to 30 people. 

*The building does not have an elevator; stairs must be used for access. 

Guest access 

You’ll have access to the shared common area and pool, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the sun. 

Pool Hours: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM 

Other things to note 

*ABOUT HOLBOX: Holbox Island is a true rustic paradise, where nature remains the star. The island’s sandy streets and unspoiled beaches are carefully preserved to maintain their natural beauty. Unlike other destinations that clear sargassum or restrict beach access, Holbox embraces its wild side, offering open and public shores for all to enjoy. 

The island’s character shifts with the seasons. During the rainy season, puddles can form along the sandy roads, adding to its laid-back, rustic charm. 

Yum Balam’s secluded location away from the lively town center enhances its peaceful atmosphere, though it’s a good idea to plan your transportation in advance to fully enjoy the tranquility. 

*WELCOME AMENITIES: We provide essential welcome items such as toilet paper, shampoo, dish soap, and drinking water. Once these are used up, guests are kindly asked to restock them. 

*QUIET HOURS: To ensure a restful stay, we have quiet hours from 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM. We kindly ask all guests to respect this, as Yum Balam is designed to be a peaceful retreat. 

*CONCIERGE SERVICES: We’re here to help with all your needs, from arranging private airport transfers and pre-arranged grocery shopping to connecting you with tour operators, booking massages, and assisting with golf or bike rentals. 

*LONG-TERM RENTALS: Please note that electricity consumption is not included in long-term rentals (over 28 nights). 

*PEST CONTROL: While we fumigate monthly, please understand that, being surrounded by nature, mosquitoes, ants, and other insects are common. 

*POWER OUTAGES: Power outages can occasionally occur in Holbox, especially due to storms or issues with the local power company. 

*CASH RECOMMENDATIONS: We highly recommend traveling with cash, specially for taxis. 

*DRINKING WATER: We offer complimentary drinking water for your convenience. Should you need more, 20-liter bottles can be purchased for $100 MXN. 

*REVIEWS: We truly value your feedback—it helps us grow and ensures we’re delivering the best experience possible. If you encounter any concerns during your stay, please let us know so we can address them right away. Welcome to our beautiful jungle apartment in Tulum. At Calma Tulum, you will find a charming 1-bedroom second floor apartment that combines comfort and style in an incomparable natural environment.  Calma Tulum is the perfect refuge for those looking for a serene and sophisticated place, offering a unique experience inTulum. 

The space 

This cozy apartment includes a kitchen equipped with everything you need to prepare your favorite meals, a living room, and a full bathroom that offers all modern comforts.  The apartment has air conditioning to guarantee a pleasant temperature at all times, great quality WIFI and private parking. Guest access 

The entire apartment is yours exclusively for the duration of the stay and it is for two people only.  There is a communal rooftop area with a pool overlooking the jungle. This area is shared with another one bedroom apartment.

description:
Property Description

Spacious 4-bedroom House is only 10 minutes away from the beach! After a dbeach, parks & attractions nearby, relax & entertain the kids in this family-friendly home. You will feel like you are in paradise with a place to unwind.  ✔ HEATED POOL ✔ Water Pool SLIDE ✔ Screened Patio, BBQ, and outdoor dining ✔ Trampoline ✔ Table Tennis and Air Hockey ✔ Smart TVs in each room ✔ Kids Entertainment: Play Set, Board games, Drawing Supplies, Table, Giant Jenga ✔ Sleep 16  

The space  

Our Mission is to provide the best Vacation Rental Home experience for all our guests no matter what brought you to the area. We are set up for families, friend groups, nurses, & business travelers. There is a little bit of everything in our home including a place to relax by the heated pool, splash on the water slide, jump on the trampoline, grill a fantastic meal for friends/family, enjoy a meal outside, or sip a cup of coffee on the private, screened in patio, unwind with a movie, sleep in & relax in our Luxury King & Queen beds, get a little work done, or have a home base for an extended period of time.  ★ 4 BEDROOMS ★ There are 4 bright bedrooms within the home filled with comfortable beds topped in hotel-quality linen along with wall-mounted Smart TVs and reading lamps giving everyone their own space to unwind. ✔ Master Bedroom: 1 King Bed, Crib ✔ 2nd Bedroom:: 2 Queen Beds, Pack-N-Play ✔ 3rd Bedroom: 1 Queen Bed ✔ 4th Bedroom: 2 Full Beds ✔ Living Room: 2 Sofa beds and Air Mattress Clean Sheets are provided for all beds with extra pillows and blankets.  ★ LIVING ROOM★ Stream all your favorites on the big-screen TV while you relax on the sofa loaded with soft cushions. Air mattress can be used to accommodate an additional two guests.  ✔ Air Hockey ✔ Highspeed WI-FI ✔ Smart TV ✔ Kids’ Playhouse, Board games, Drawing Table, Giant Jenga ✔ Space for additional guests  ★ KITCHEN & DINING ★ Prepare all your family favorites in the modern kitchen that comes fully equipped with everything you could need to cook. Brew up your coffee each morning at the Keurig coffee station then hydrate throughout the day with filtered water and ice from the handy fridge dispenser. Serve up your culinary creations at the dining table or open up the double glass doors and entertain outside in style with poolside alfresco dining.  ✔ Essential cookware & utensils ✔ Baking sheets ✔ Coffee machine and Kettle (some coffee and tea is provided) ✔ Cooking Oil & Spices: Sugar / Salt / Pepper ✔ 1 Paper Towel Roll to get you started, you must provide the rest for the duration of your stay. ✔ Spacious Dining Table ✔ Outdoor Dining and BBQ ✔ First Aid Kit ✔ Dishwasher, Dish Soap and 5 pods to start with ✔ 5 Trash Bags, you must provide the rest for the duration of your stay.  ★ 2 BATHROOMS ★ The 2 bathrooms come stocked with all the essential amenities and plenty of fluffy towels for your stay. ✔ Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Soap ✔ Hand Soap ✔ Hair Dryers ✔ Bath Towels (1 per guest), hand towels, and beach towels to all Guests upon Check-in. ✔ 4 Toilet Paper Rolls to get you started, you must provide the rest for the duration of your stay.  Guests also have access to the full laundry with a washer and dryer set so you can pack light and wash on the go. ✔ Iron ✔ Ironing Board ✔ Laundry Detergent ✔ Broom/Mop/ Dust Pan  ★ OUTDOOR ★ Step out into your own private outdoor oasis and dive into the refreshing pool surrounded by relaxing sun lounges and a fun trampoline for the kids. Fire up the BBQ grill on a sunny day and spend your afternoons soaking up the sun surrounded by friends at the outdoor table.  ✔ Resort Style Heated Pool (40$/night) ✔ Water Slide ✔ Inflatable Pool Toys ✔ Trampoline ✔ Sun Lounges with Beach Towels ✔ Screened Patio with Table Tennis and Dining Table ✔ Gas Grill - If the gas tank is empty you can exchange it at almost any gas station and we will refund you money!  

Guest access  

SWIMMING POOL Our pool is private and you get full access to it. We also offer the heated option for an additional fee. Regular pool water temperature is usually comfortable all year long, anyway if you prefer it warmer or traveling with kids, we recommend requesting it in advance.  During winter months it can take up to 48 hours to get to the desired temperature (82 Fahrenheit max). Please be advised that it might take longer if the air temperature is lower than 70. For last-minute bookings, it will be turned on as soon as possible.  We charge 40$/night for the whole stay to cover extra electricity expenses. We do not add it to the rental price, because not all people want to use it, and we are trying to keep our properties affordable for everyone.  EARLY CHECK-IN / LATE CHECK-OUT Check-in is after 4:00 pm and Check-out is 10:00 am. You will be provided with an access code that activates at your arrival. Early Check-In or Late Check-out are subject to availability and need to be requested in advance. We charge a flat fee of $40 per hour, if you need to get more than 2 hours, reach out for a custom quote.  Baggage drop-off is available by request and depends on availability.  Guests have private access to the entire home and outdoor areas as well as free Wi-Fi, free parking for 5 cars, complimentary coffee, and access to the full laundry and streaming apps on the Smart TVs.  Pool Service is scheduled weekly, usually on Thursdays. It might change due to weather conditions. Lawn Service is done every 2 weeks. Please let us know if you need specific dates when services will be done during your stay.  

Other things to note  

We are located in a residential neighborhood. Please be mindful of our neighbors and city laws all the time. Read the rules carefully to prevent any issues during your stay.  ★LOUD NOISES ARE PROHIBITED★ Any sound that crosses a property line at an unreasonable loud volume is unlawful within the city and may be subject to a fine of up to $1000. Per occurrence, as per the city noise ordinance of the Oakland Park Code of Ordinance. QUITE HOURS: 9:00PM - 9:00AM - this means that during this time NO MUSIC is to be played in the backyard or pool area, and, NO NOISE - anyone outside must keep all conversations to a cell phone level to ensure we don’t disturb our neighbors who have work and kids that go to school.  ★ NO PARTIES/EVENTS ★ We kindly ask you to treat our home as your own to preserve its pristine condition for future guests and your return visits. House is only for you and amount of people mentioned in the reservation. All unauthorized visitors will be considered as house rules violations. Guests agree to keep premises in good condition and be financially responsible for any items missing or broken.\  ★ NO STREET/GRASS PARKING - 5 CARS ONLY★ NO STREET OR GRASS parking, it is strictly prohibited. Our vacation rental has a license for only 5 cars being parked at the property parking lot. Parking on the street, on grass, behind bushes, or by neighbors' houses is illegal and will result in a violation of city law. All vehicles associated with the Vacation Rental must be parked within a driveway in compliance with the Code of Ordinances of the City of Oakland Park.  ★ NO SMOKING ★ Please refrain from smoking (anything) inside the home! Any smoking evidence will result in a fee for Odor Removal, Duct Cleaning, and furniture cleaning. You will be required to pay an additional odor removal fee of $750. SMOKING MARIJUANA (inside, outside, in the front yard, in the backyard, on our parking lot - anywhere on the property) IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED. If our neighbors or personnel report the smell of weed, we will be required to call authorities, since it is illegal in Florida and prohibited at our vacation rental.  ★ NO DRUGS or WEAPONS ★ Our community has zero tolerance towards DRUGS or WEAPONS, and it will be reported to the City Police immediately.  ★ PET-FRIENDLY HOME ★ Bring your furry friends along for an exciting vacation. They’ll get to enjoy and run around the spacious backyard while you relax by the pool. Please note that we charge a FEE 100$ per pet. Please clean after your pets if needed.  SECURITY AND SAFETY  We are doing our best to keep the community and our guests safe. Thank you very much for your understanding.  Finally, know that we do have security cameras and noise and smoke detectors on-premises, and tampering with any security system is considered a felony offense in the State of Florida and will also result in the termination of your reservation. We have one, motion-activated recording camera overlooking the front yard which records video and audio. Another camera overlooks the backyard with a pool for safety issues. It is motion-activated and records audio or video. All devices are on the exterior of the property. There is also a smart home device on the ceiling that actively records noise decibel levels. It does not record audio or video.  By booking this home, you are agreeing to these house rules and agree to hold yourself liable for any personal injuries that may occur during your stay on the property. If you have a question or concerns, please message us. Our priority is to give each guest a 5-star experienceay of exploring the .

title: NANOK
description:
Property Description

NANOK THERMAL EXPERIENCE WITH BARREL SAUNA, SPA AND COLD OUTDOOR SHOWER Embedded in family origins, the Nanok is a reminder to cherish the moments shared with our loved ones. Come create everlasting memories, come enjoy the Nanok’s experience. This name, shrouded in mystery yet evocative, encapsulates the very essence that thrives within this micro cabin. Nanok derives from the initial letters of the owners’ and their children’s names, embodying the unity and family warmth that emanate from this haven of comfort and well-being. At Nanok, life happens outdoors. With two terraces and two patio heaters, everything is in place to stretch out your evenings under the sky, even when the air gets crisp. It’s also the only cabin on the mountain that offers a true hot/cold thermal experience, a real treat for mountain biking enthusiasts (and fans of our bike & sleep formula) looking to unwind after a day riding the region’s best trails. Start with a soak in the hot tub or a good sweat in the sauna, follow it with an invigorating rinse under the cold outdoor shower, and enjoy full-body, mind-clearing relaxation. At Nanok, you’ll love lounging, with only the gentle serenade of the surrounding nature as your soundtrack. Close your eyes and let this symphony lull you, soothe you, transform you. title: CLIFFno46
description:
Property Description

CLIFFNO46 Do you know the legend of Cliff? Cliff, a man deeply in love with nature and driven by adventure, roamed the world in search of the perfect place to settle. Despite his relentless searches, he had not yet found it. One day, during an epic expedition on the majestic slopes of Maelström Mountain, Cliff was captivated by golden rays of light shimmering on tree leaves. Drawn by a mystical force, he followed these gleams until he reached the summit of the mountain. There, before him, unfolded a breathtaking spectacle: the vastness of the horizon. With his gaze fixed between sky and earth, Cliff felt a profound certainty: he had found his haven, his refuge in the heart of nature. Is this legend true? No! But does it not exist a little in each of us? That’s why the owners wanted to create a place for the Cliff within us, in search of wonder and the perfect place to pause for a moment. What entices us about Cliff no. 46? • Its vast belvedere, part of which is covered, allowing one to enjoy the pleasures of being outdoors, rain or shine. • The wood-burning fireplace, located on the belvedere, which allows one to appreciate the dance of flames blending with the splendors of the panoramic view. • Its master bedroom upstairs, with its fully glazed wall, giving the illusion of floating above the horizon. • Its Bike & Sleep experience with its direct access from the belvedere to the mountain biking and hiking trails of Sentiers du Moulin Book your stay at Cliff no. 46, where the beauty of nature meets luxury and comfort. PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.1 Beach Umbrella NO PETS or SMOKING 




 Step into your dreamy natural light-filled condo oasis with all the bells and whistles! Dive into the clubhouse pool or soak in the hot tub, play a game of tennis or basketball, or let the kids unwind at the playground. With updated fixtures throughout, this 2- bed 2- bath gem is the perfect blend of luxury and convenience, just minutes away from various dining, shopping, and near IMG and Beaches. Master bedroom has Queen bed, TV, and its own en-suite full bathroom with walk in shower plus huge walk-in closet. Guest bedroom offering 2 twin beds. Fully stocked kitchen contains all that you want for making and enjoying meals at home when not enjoying one of the many dining options only minutes away. Welcome home to your own slice of paradise! The best part of being in West Bradenton is that you are minutes to the white sand beaches of Anna Maria Island. There are also several wildlife preserves nearby, great for hiking and biking. If you would rather fish for the afternoon, there are great spots at piers around the area or book a fishing charter. This comfortable private condo is located just 10 minutes from Bradenton Beach or Anna Maria Island Beach is just 6.8 miles away. The Shoppes of Bradenton Commons is within walking distance and offers grocery shopping, restaurants, a Sports bar, and an AMC theater. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 16-minute drive (8.2 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands circle is about 30-minute drive south which is a great place for watching a sunset from a rooftop bar and causal and upscale dining and shopping. You don't need to go that far for dining options as Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. Don't forget a trip to downtown Bradenton or Riverwalk, which is on the water and also has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community made up of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton’s best art galleries.

All you will need to worry is to bring your swim suit. Guest access The Neighbourhood is called Region 15, happens to be the newest area in Tulum being developed. La Veleta is a 5min drive, city centre 10-15min drive, beach 15-20min drive. To get around you use taxis but it may be more convenient to have your own transportation method (Car,scooter,bike). There is free parking both in the building and on the street 24hrs. Other things to note Tulum is one of the fastest growing cities in Mexico, as a result there may be occasional power outages all over the town, you’ll be surrounded mostly by jungle however you may see sites being developed. Natural area with no street illumination at night and unpaved roads there could be potholes during the rainy season. Tulum's Cellular network is not the best, make sure to plan ahead, as internet access could be limited to Wi-Fi networks.

title: Stunning 2BR Apartment with Ocean Views - B201
description:
Property Description

Escape to Yum Balam, located in peaceful Punta Cocos—the quietest part of the island. Far from the crowds and noise of the island center, this peaceful location allows you to fully immerse yourself in the natural beauty and laid-back vibe of Holbox.  Just steps away, a nearly private shallow turquoise beach awaits. Far from the crowds, it's the perfect spot to relax and unwind.  Stay connected with fast Starlink Wi-Fi (up to 50 Mbps).  Experience Holbox at its most serene. 

The space 

Spacious 2-bedroom apartment, perfect for families, couples, or friends looking to relax and connect with nature.  The master bedroom features a king-size bed, while the second has a queen-size trundle (kangaroo) bed with a double. There’s also a sofa bed in the living room. Enjoy two full bathrooms, a smart TV in the living room and a fully equipped kitchen—perfect for cooking and cozy nights in. Both bedrooms have sheer and blackout blinds for your comfort.  This is an ideal space for nature lovers, for those looking to unwind listening to the birds, and enjoying the views from the balcony. Located just meters from one of Holbox’s best spots to experience the magical bioluminescence—often visible right from the beach out front, especially during the new moon.  Traveling with a larger group? Let us know, and we´ll share details on additional sister apartments in the same building!  *The building does not have an elevator, stairs must be used for access. 

Guest access 

You will have access to the common area and pool, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the sun.  Pool hours: 8:00 am - 10:00 pm 

Other things to note 

Washer is currently OUT OF SERVICE. Dryer is working.  ABOUT HOLBOX: Holbox Island is a true rustic paradise, where nature remains the star. The island’s sandy streets and unspoiled beaches are carefully preserved to maintain their natural beauty. Unlike other destinations that clear sargassum or restrict beach access, Holbox embraces its wild side, offering open and public shores for all to enjoy. The island’s character shifts with the seasons. During the rainy season, puddles can form along the sandy roads, adding to its laid-back, rustic charm. Yum Balam’s secluded location away from the lively town center enhances its peaceful atmosphere, though it’s a good idea to plan your transportation in advance to fully enjoy the tranquility.  WELCOME AMENITIES: We provide essential welcome items such as toilet paper, shampoo, dish soap, and drinking water. Once these are used up, guests are kindly asked to restock them.  QUIET HOURS: To ensure a restful stay, we have quiet hours from 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM. We kindly ask all guests to respect this, as Yum Balam is designed to be a peaceful retreat.  CONCIERGE SERVICES: We’re here to help with all your needs, from arranging private airport transfers and pre-arranged grocery shopping to connecting you with tour operators, booking massages, and assisting with golf or bike rentals.  LONG-TERM RENTALS: Please note that electricity consumption is not included in long-term rentals (over 28 nights).  PEST CONTROL: While we fumigate monthly, please understand that, being surrounded by nature, mosquitoes, ants, and other insects are common.  POWER OUTAGES: Power outages can occasionally occur in Holbox, especially due to storms or issues with the local power company.  CASH RECOMMENDATIONS: We highly recommend traveling with cash, specially for taxis.  DRINKING WATER: We offer complimentary drinking water for your convenience. Should you need more, 20-liter bottles can be purchased for $100 MXN.  *REVIEWS: We truly value your feedback—it helps us grow and ensures we’re delivering the best experience possible. If you encounter any concerns during your stay, please let us know so we can address them right away. Our goal is for you to have an amazing 5-star experience, and we want to make sure there are no surprises when it's time to share your review!

title: Ocean View 2 BR - D201
description:
Property Description

Yum Balam building is located in Punta Cocos, the most quiet part of the Island. Our location is perfect to enjoy the magic of the island in a more peaceful atmoshphere away from the hustle and tourism at the island center. 

 

Enjoy the ocean view and the most amazing sunsets straight from both bedrooms and an almost private turquoise shallow water beach which is just steps away from the apartment. 

 

Starlink wifi up to 50 megas, connectivity won´t be an issue here! 




The space 




2 bedroom apartment ideal for families, couples or group of friends who want to have a lovely vacation connecting with nature. 

 

Both bedrooms have ocean view. Master bedroom with king size bed, second bedroom with a kangaroo bed double size bed and a twin size bed and sofa bed in living room. 2 full bathrooms, smart TV in living room, washer and dryer inside the apartment. Fully equipped kitchen for you to cook your own meals if you feel like enjoying the down time and staying in. 

 

This apartment is ideal for a relaxing vacation and for guests who want to connect with nature, enjoy the sound of birds and contemplate the beautiful sunsets. The perfect setting for an amazing getaway. 

 

We are meters away from the main touristic spot to watch bioluminescence this magical phenomenom at night, but you can aslo watch it from the beach in front of us, specially during new moon. 

 

If you are a group bigger than 6 people, please let us know so we can share details of other apartments in the same building! 




Guest access 




You will have access to the common shared area and the pool. 

 

Pool hours: 8:00 am - 10:00 pm 




Other things to note 




* We want to make sure you have a good rest so that´s why we have quiet hours from 11 pm to 8 am. We ask all our guests to respect this rule as Yum Balam is meant to be felt like a retreat vacation. 

 

* Our concierge team is always available to help you schedule private transportation from and to the airport, tours, massages, utv, golfcart or bike rental, etc. 

 

* In up to 3 nights we include all electricity consumption. In stays over 4 nights we include 15 kwh of electricity consumption per day. In case guests consume more, they should pay the difference; price per kwh is $4.50 mxn. A/C is power saving type. (if the difference to pay is less than $100 mxn, it won´t be charged) 

 

* We fumigate monthly but please understand we are located amongst nature so mosquitoes, ants and some other insects are common. 

 

* It´s important to mention that Holbox has power outages from time to time that may be affected by storms or the power company. The power company is working to stop these issues. 

 

* We highly recommend traveling with cash. 

 

*We provide a jar of drinking water as a courtesy. We also have 20 L water bottles for sale $60 mxn, please request them to you host if you´d like to have it for your arrival.

title: Tribe Resort
description:
Property Description

Tibe Resort – Elegance by the Sea, Where Refinement Meets Freedom




Nestled between the infinite blue of the ocean and the tropical serenity of an untouched coastline, Tibe Resort is more than just a place to stay—it’s a sanctuary for those seeking beauty, relaxation, and unforgettable experiences.




This intimate 48-room resort is designed as a contemporary oasis, where every detail invites calm and comfort. Spacious, bright, and tastefully decorated, the rooms offer soothing views of the gardens, the pool, or the endless horizon. Some rooms open directly to the beach, allowing you to enjoy the first rays of the sun with your feet in the sand.




At the heart of the resort, an Olympic-sized pool, surrounded by palm trees, beckons you for a swim, a relaxing dip, or early morning laps in a postcard-perfect setting. Just a few steps away, the private beach invites you to unwind with its lounge chairs, golden sand, and direct access to turquoise waters.




But the Tibe Resort experience doesn’t stop there. It’s also a place to live and play. Embark on a private Hatch catamaran excursion, where you’ll sail into the sunset, surrounded by a fiery sky and crystal-clear waters. Snorkeling, diving, on-board tastings, and ambient music—all designed to create an unforgettable moment.




Sporting activities, relaxation, starlit evenings, refined local cuisine—everything is tailored to combine freedom, discreet luxury, and complete immersion in the tropical way of life.








Tibe Resort is more than just accommodation. It’s a world of its own.

A place where you feel free, pampered, and inspired.

A place you leave with your heart full and your soul at peace.
